person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: On Tuesday and Wednesday , opposition leader Aung San Suu Kyi was restricted to her home by the military government to prevent her from being drawn into the protests .

Let's think step by step.

| Person |
|--------|
| opposition leader Aung San Suu Kyi |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Person" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Person |
|--------|
| opposition leader Aung San Suu Kyi |
| military government |

Note: "military government" is a collective noun that refers to a group of people, but in this context, it is clear that the entities being referred to are the individuals in control of the military government. Therefore, it can be considered a valid "Person" entity.
